entries.title: Bluetooth audio dropouts
entries.description: Audio cuts in and out during playback.
entries.suspectedCause: Weak signal strength, interference, or power-saving mode on the phone.
recommendedSteps: Move the phone closer to the head unit.
Disable aggressive battery saving for media apps.
Re-pair the phone and retry playback.

entries.title: No audio from speakers
entries.description: Playback is active but audio is silent.
entries.suspectedCause: Muted output, very low volume, or wrong audio source.
recommendedSteps: Confirm the correct audio source is selected.

entries.title: Bass feels weak
entries.description: Low-frequency response is weaker than expected.
entries.suspectedCause: Sub level or bass boost not calibrated.
recommendedSteps: Increase sub level in DSP settings.
Run auto-tune while the cabin is quiet.

entries.title: GPS position jumps
entries.description: Location updates are inconsistent or jumpy.
entries.suspectedCause: Poor GPS signal or obstructed antenna.
recommendedSteps: Ensure the GPS antenna has a clear sky view.
Switch to offline mode briefly and refresh.

entries.title: Voice assistant not responding
entries.description: Assistant does not react to wake words or commands.
entries.suspectedCause: Microphone muted or assistant service paused.
